5’4”, 140lbs, a standard size M or 10P. The top fits ok, slightly snug, but the pants are a bit too big for a standard M.  Odd mismatch btwn the 2. Fabric is fine. Disappointed.  Pant length is a bit short if one is petite and would be way too short for a taller person.
It's thin but nice fabric the zipper is big, my problem was no pockets in pants or top

评论概述: Grab you seam ripper!  I am 5’6” tall.  These pants were way too short, but now fit perfectly.
评论详情: Fortunately, the designer used tag stitches to hold the pant cuff in place.  I used my seam ripper to carefully tear out the tag stitch.  Now they are the perfect length for me.  If you are taller, these pants might not work.  I gained about 3 “ on the inseam.  I normally have a 31” inseam.I agree with the others that the fabric is very soft and comfortable.  They wash nicely.  They don’t wrinkle.

评论概述: bright color, less sweatsuit-y and more satin feel, no pockets
评论详情: I ordered this sweatsuit for mother to have a comfortable outfit that she could get in and out of more easily after hip surgery.  While she does like this outfit, especially this intense pink color, there are no pockets, and the material itself is less athletic "sweatsuit" and more smooth, almost satin feel.  She's a very petite lady and Small fits fairly well.
I got the dusty pink. It’s a nice thick material. A little on the cheap side though. It’s too short for me at 5’9”.

I would never say this combination is a sweat suit. The thought of working out or sweating in this soft lightweight silk-like material would be unbearable. Rather, call it a casual pant suit to be worn together or as classic separates. True to size with a flattering shape (thanks to no pockets and fitted minimalist piping) it certainly makes a statement while remaining fashionably comfortable. I like the zipper top (they say ¼ length, it’s closer to ½ for me), ready to layer it with a lacy camisole or colorful brassiere underneath and then a light turtleneck later in the season.  My one complaint was the pant length: too short & I’m not wild about cuffs. Thankfully, I found a finished hem was underneath the cuff. So I snipped the fold away and gained 2 inches in length. Now the suit fits perfectly with all types and heights of shoes. Love it much, I have another one on order.

评论概述: not very breathable--more like a pant suit
评论详情: First this is not really a sweatsuit, but more like a pant suit.  I think its more on the dressier side, not really sporty. The fabric has quite a bit of rayon.  The fabric content is 45% rayon--48% polyester--7% spandex. It feels sort of like a heavy jersey knit,--its very soft.I absolutely love the, what I would call a taupe color and I also like the pattern cut, the style is relaxed. It is well sewn. I really liked the zip up collar that turns into a cowl neckline. Oddly there are no pockets on this pant suit.  I do wish the fabric were more sweatshirt like.  I really didn't care for the fabric at all, its not very breathable.  I ordered a size large and probably could have been OK with a size medium. It fits a little large on me and this probably isn't going to shrink in the wash.I will likely pass this on to someone, as its not breathable enough for me and the fit was a little too large.
Love this set, bought 3! The price is great and the feel is great, I use it to travel! Only downside is it doesn’t have pockets, but I’d that’s something you don’t mind it’s a steal!

I got this set for my mom to hang around the house with guests over the holidays. It's thick, it's soft, it's weirdly springy. It's somewhere between pajamas and going out clothes. She absolutely loves it.  She's a size 12, and I got her the large which fits her perfectly. The top is soft, the wide zippered collar gives it a nice structure, keeps it from looking like pajamas. I've been down this road with the pants on these sets being too wide and loose, but these are perfectly tapered so they don't look like lounge pants.  I love this so much I'm going to steal it from her after Christmas.
Material is very comfortable, feels good to the skin, i like the color too which is dark gray. My only beef is that, I wish that it could have at least some pockets on the pants!!!
The material is super soft, and very comfortable. It is a very lightweight outfit. The top is shorter than what I expected. I am most disappointed that the pants do not have pockets!!
Love the color, style & fit!
I purchased this for my Mother and she loves it! It is very well made, warm and true to size.

The fit is flattering, offering a relaxed yet stylish look.  The half-zip sweatshirt and sweatpants combo is both fashionable and easy to wear. It’s comfortable, stylish, and versatile, making it a great go-to outfit for any casual day. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a chic yet comfy option.

评论概述: Comfortable and stylish 2 piece sweatsuit set that my wife enjoys wearing.
评论详情: My wife enjoys wearing sweatsuit sets to relax in or when she is doing some light chores around the home our outside.  So, when I requested this Women's 2 Piece Sets Sweatsuit from Casly Lamiit on Vine, my wife was very happy with my decision! She loves how the lapel half-zip sweatshirt and matching sweatpants are perfect for this coming fall season. She loves how the fabric is soft, comfortable, and feels great against her skin. She was pleasantly surprised by the quality – it’s thick enough to keep her warm on cooler days but still breathable. She loves how the style is effortlessly chic, with the lapel design adding a nice touch of sophistication. She loves how the half-zip feature makes it easy to put on and take off, and the fit is just right – not too tight, not too loose. She's worn this set for lounging at home, running errands, and even a casual day out, and it’s versatile enough for all of these occasions. Overall, my wife highly recommends this set to anyone looking for a comfortable yet stylish outfit this fall. It’s definitely become a staple in her wardrobe! 5 out of 5 stars.
